reference.title: ERXFR_EL1, Selected Error Record Feature Register, EL1
reference.shortdesc: Register ERXFR_EL1 accesses the ERR<n>FR feature register for the error record selected by ERRSELR_EL1.SEL.

section.p: If ERRSELR_EL1.SEL==0, then ERXFR_EL1 accesses the ERR0FR register of the core error record. See ERR0FR, Error Record Feature RegisterThe ERR0FR defines which of the common architecturally defined features are implemented and, of the implemented features, which are software programmable..
If ERRSELR_EL1.SEL==1, then ERXFR_EL1 accesses the ERR1FR register of the DSU error record. See the Arm DynamIQ Shared Unit Technical Reference Manual.
